testimonialsHeader.text: We proudly invest in nurturing and developing our people, striving to make each individual reach their full potential and maximise their success at Brevan Howard.

list.quoteText: The firm’s commitment to portfolio managers’ long-term development and sourcing exceptional talent has created a fulfilling environment which supports and challenges.

I joined straight from university and worked in several teams before moving into portfolio management. The environment is very open and I enjoy learning from the talented people around me. We have a pragmatic and collaborative approach to markets.
Our friendly and down to earth culture combined with many brilliant minds allows us to provide the best possible solutions and experience for investors.
Collaboration is at the core of what we do. We encourage a culture of teamwork and provide our traders with the resources necessary to problem solve, innovate and succeed.

diversitySection.name: Diversity & Inclusion
diversitySection.title:
An Inclusive
Workspace
diversitySection.text:
As a firm built on inclusivity and collaboration, we believe diversity drives results, strengthens our competitive advantage and accelerates innovation.

With over 20 nationalities represented across the business, we are empowered by the commonalities and differences found within our diverse team.

We are committed to attracting and developing the best and brightest individuals through our recruiting initiatives, training program and professional development offerings.

joinUsOurTeam.name: JOIN OUR TEAM
joinUsOurTeam.title:
Interested in Working
at Brevan Howard?

items.title: Professionals
items.text: If you are ready to challenge yourself in a performance-driven culture that recognises and rewards success, we would like to meet you.

items.title: Students
items.text: Do you have curiosity about global financial markets, and possess the creativity and critical thinking to drive the future of Brevan Howard?

careersStats.columnTextLeft:
We combine a dedication to meeting our clients’ needs with a commitment to our people.

At Brevan Howard, you will find the dynamism and entrepreneurial spirit of a small firm with the infrastructure, technology and support of a large organisation.
careersStats.columnTextRight: We are always looking for exceptional talent to join our global community. From undergraduates to experienced professionals, we look for individuals who are intellectually curious, passionate and share our mission and principles.
careersStats.name: careers
careersStats.title: Join Our Team
